title: Bi-Weekly Gaming Discussion Thread
selftext:
What are you playing, r/India? Let us use this thread to discuss any games you're playing, have played or are going to play. (Mobile and board games included!)

What game are you looking forward to? Are you a developer? Show us your wares!

Please don't just list the names of games, make sure to write a word or two about them as well.

Check out r/IndianGaming! They are an active community and also host a few co-op sessions.

**Gaming Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Gaming+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/xagdqefyv8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=f975f1c3093a3d9598a1da39854b03d1250bd55d
comments: Lies of P is actually pretty good

Absurd price on steam. Eldenring is cheaper than Lies of P.

I know I can play it on Game pass but I'm a sucker for souls games and there will be dlc as well.

I'll instead get Lords of Fallen which is still a bit pricey but still a lot cheaper than LoP.

I agree with the absurd price. Too expensive. Regional pricing is dead, if we have to pay as much as a first world country, then just remove regional pricing altogether. 

I'm playing it on gamepass but will grab it eventually on steam. 

I'm on the fence about LOTF, I hope there's a demo out first. 

Did you try out AC 6?

Yeah finished 3 playthroughs and waiting for dlc now. Once you get a decent build, you can roflstomp anything.

I might wait a week before getting LoTF. So far, everything looks amazing but there's no point in preordering and there are enough games for now so I can be patient.

Currently playing MK1 and having an absolute blast.

Still playing Total War: Warhammer. Now as the Empire.

"I am Prince and Emperor!"
Darksiders 1. Cool game . Irritating at times
Playing COD DMZ .. its preety fun for a free game.

Hi All, I would like to invite all the word game enthusiasts to try Spellink - A word game that lets gamers form a word from a partial combination of letters. You can win badges depending on the score! :) Please do try and let us know your feedback :)
Today's word of the day : Boat, play the game Spellink and share the badges you have won :)
Today's word of the day !! Place ! Play Spellink and share your high score :)

Spellink's words of the day!

4 letter word : Able

5 letter word : Cloud

6 letter word : Fables

Play now & post the badge you have won !!

Hey all! 

Spellink salutes Team India!

And there is no surprise in Today's word of the day: India! As our team marched to the Hall of Fame, can you use the same word and earn Spellink's hall of fame badge?

Spellink's Word of the day : Hack :) :) 

https://preview.redd.it/art69prdcjad1.jpeg?width=1013&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=a7d4dbb92e01766c44b3ae78ef8d68c9e540eb23
Today's Spellink word of the day: Apple

Today's word of the day : Chair

https://preview.redd.it/xtqxxzdknwcd1.png?width=1333&format=png&auto=webp&s=d944e731596bc677be56a80a15295a56b723e5de
